author: Erika Mustermann
short_description: A short description for the masterdata project.

__prompts__.author: Name of the main author
__prompts__.project_name: The name of the folder containing the generated files <project-name>
__prompts__.module_name: The name of the folder src/<module_name>, default is the <project_name> separated with underscores
__prompts__.include_python_masterdata: Do you want to add Python schema files?
__prompts__.include_excel_masterdata: Do you want to add Excel schema files?
